Brewed to Purr-fection, Cuddled with Affection

CATNIP CAFE

CATNIP CAFE

Discover Cat Bliss at Catnip Cafe: A Haven for Cat and Coffee Lovers!

Indulge your senses in a purr-fectly delightful experience at Catnip Cafe, the ultimate destination

for cat enthusiasts and coffee connoisseurs alike. Nestled in the heart of Osijek, our feline-friendly

haven invites you to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life and immerse yourself

in a cozy ambiance where whiskers and coffee beans coexist harmoniously.

Espresso


Experience the bold and concentrated energy of espresso, perfect for those moments when you're in no rush. Savor its intense flavor, as there's no need to grab and go. Ideal for those seeking a moment of coffee bliss without the hustle.

Cappuccino


If you're not after an intense energy boost, our latte offers a harmonious blend of espresso and creamy steamed milk. It provides a milder, comforting flavor, perfect for a leisurely coffee break in our cozy setting.

Cafe Latte


Craving sophistication without the hustle and bustle? Choose the balanced layers of espresso, steamed milk, and frothy foam in our cappuccino. Its textured richness caters to those who appreciate a nuanced and satisfying coffee experience in a relaxed environment.

Your Coffee, Your Way


Create your own coffee experience with custom-blended beans. Craft a bold espresso, enjoy the comfort of a latte with steamed milk, or savor the layered elegance of a cappuccino. Your unique coffee creation awaits – discover a world of flavors for a perfect sip that reflects your individuality.

Meet our staff


Step into our cat haven and say hello to the real stars of the show - our fabulous feline crew! Each whiskered wonder brings a unique touch of charm and character to our cozy cat cafe.

Whether they're gracefully lounging in sunlit spots, engaging in spirited play, or simply providing the perfect company, our cats are the heart and soul of our cafe. Get ready to be whisked away by their adorable personalities as you sip, chat, and unwind in their delightful presence.

Feel free to interact, take a moment to appreciate their unique purr-sonalities, and perhaps you'll find a new feline friend to make your visit truly special. Welcome to the purr-adise that is our cat cafe!

Cat cafe visitors with allergies should take precautions due to potential allergen exposure.
